cards.text: Make a WH question of the given statement using "Who": That woman is my mother.
Make a WH question of the given sentence using "How": I am fine.
Make a WH question of the given statement using "What": There is a laptop on the table.
cards.answer: What is there on the table?

cards.text: State true or false: "That is my brother's car." when rephrased as a WH question turns into "Whose car is that?"
State true or false: "I go to the office by motorcycle." when rephrased as a WH question turns into "How do you go to office?"
Make a WH question of the given statement using "Where": My cell phone is in my room.
State true or false: "I live in a village." when rephrased as a question turns into "Where do you live?".
Make a WH question of the given sentence using "Why": They are late because they missed the train.
Make a WH question of the given sentence using "When": My exam is on Sunday.
Make a WH question of the given sentence using "Where": I live in Kathmandu.

description: Make WH questions with the help of the given images.
